org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.runner

Class BaseOptimizationRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.runner.BaseOptimizationRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptimizationRunner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalOptimizationRunner

    public abstract class BaseOptimizationRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOptimizationRunner
    BaseOptimization runner: responsible for scheduling tasks, saving results using the result saver, etc.
